author: Krista Torres
title: This Mom Taped A Sign On Her Kid's Back To Stop People From Judging Her In The Store
description: "I am only five, I can't stay home alone..." View Entire Post ›
content:
MaryAnn Fausey Resendez
She also said she tried to order home delivery for her groceries, but there were no available deliveries that day because so many people were using it.
